you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1604 a and today's date is June
29th 2018 and the tot of the episode is
central bankers begin to panic is the
u.s. leaving the World Trade
Organization let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we've talked
about consumer confidence before and
right now consumer confidence the hope
part of it has slid to five-month lows
and the reason for this is that people
are seeing inflation right now and
people are a little bit nervous and
people are being laid off and people are
still with those low-paying jobs and we
know that wages are falling we know that
the savings rate is falling and the real
economy is breaking and falling apart
right in front of our eyes I mean that
is a fact we've been following it we've
been looking at it we've been monitoring
it and this is what we've been seeing
now what's very interesting is that when
they asked about the US economy with
trade you know would more trade or less
trade with other countries be better for
the US economy and the people said yes
more trade with other countries would be
better and they really didn't worry
about the tariffs and things like that
and what is happening here is that
remember most of our manufacturing has
been moved out of this country the
globalists the central bankers have been
pushing their agenda for a very long
time where they've been pushing
everything out of this country it didn't
happen yesterday or last year or even
during Obama it happened a long time ago
and it was a very slow methodical push
to push everything out of the US and to
prepare the world for a one world
government one world type of currency
situation and we know right now that the
move is to break up this global system
to break up the central banking system
and
we can see it in many different areas
just like the agreement of NAFTA where
Trump wanted to get rid of that but
again it's very difficult just to say oh
let's get rid of it because Congress
would have to get involved with this so
they're renegotiating NAFTA now it's
been going on for quite a while
TPP was completely struck down and we
know that Trump would like to get rid of
the World Trade Organization which we'll
get into in just a minute but what we're
seeing is all these different things
make up the globalist agenda and piece
by piece by having bilateral trade deals
and doing other things by getting rid of
these other trade deals it's being
ripped apart and the central bankers the
globalists they're panicking right now
you hear the calls from the IMF the biz
they're all out there saying there might
be an economic shock Europe needs to
come together put put together a rainy
day funny fun the biz is out there
saying listen there might be a couple of
banks out here that might be
manipulating their books the same thing
that Lehman did and they're not as
strong as they are saying they are
they're doing this because they are
separating themselves from the banking
system right now yes they're part of the
banking system but once again they want
to make it look like they're above it
and keep their organization intact and
they don't care what happens to little
banks here or there if they go under it
makes no difference to them as long as
their system the creation of currency is
intact and the control of countries is
intact that's what they care about
now in the United States we can see from
many different indicators and we've been
looking at all different indicators
showing us that this whole entire system
is breaking down the numbers that are
being thrown out by the government
they're completely manipulated and what
I think is happening is that Trump with
the Patriots they're using the central
bank the globalist system and they're
pushing it to the extreme to bring down
the system this is why the corporate
media and the rest are having a
difficult time you know saying that oh
this is no good because if they started
to say that oh these numbers are
manipulated these aren't
good numbers it would refer back to what
Obama did what Clinton did what Bush did
and it would go back in time so they
really can't call these numbers out
because they haven't really changed
anything and there's a reason why Trump
and the Patriots have done this because
they're using their system and pushing
it to the edge without giving them a way
out and their way out before was going
to be with some type of an event and now
they're kind of stuck and it's very
difficult to call them out on this
because it's their system but the
everyday person is feeling this I mean
look Toys R Us just closed down they
closed their last store and 33,000
people are gonna be out of work and it's
not just that one realtor retailer it's
many many retailers around the country
and yes they had an online presence if
people don't have high paying jobs if
people don't have confidence if people
can't make ends meet they're not gonna
go out and spend money in
brick-and-mortar or online they're going
to be very very careful on what they
spend on and showing up in all different
areas especially retail and it's not
just you know goods like TVs electronics
we're also seeing it in other areas like
the food industry they're having a
difficult time they are slowing right
now traffic is drying up we also see
that Americans since inflation has
ticked up their spending is growing
faster than their incomes and we know
that the savings rate right now is
continually declining it has been
declining since 2013 because what
happens here as inflation I'm talking
about price inflation when you go to the
supermarket where you go and you try to
purchase goods that you need every day
fuels going up if these things go up it
takes more dollars to pay for something
which means people are now laying out
more money than they're bringing in and
as this continues we call this inflation
and hype
inflation which means the value of the
dollar continually declines and it
doesn't matter how much people pay you
doesn't matter if they raise the minimum
wage to $25 an hour you will never be
able to make ends meet and this is what
we're seeing right now and wages
they've been declining and they really
haven't been going anywhere yes they say
they moved up a little bit but again
they move up they go back down and
they've been bantering around and
they're not really and we're not really
seeing the wages that we saw back in the
70s remember when we came off the gold
standard and then all of a sudden
housing was repriced incomes were
repriced interest rates were very high
and everything had to be redone because
they were creating so much currency that
the value of the currency was declining
and we saw inflation and they had high
interest rates now we're on the back end
interest rates very low income dropping
savings dropping nobody's keeping money
in CDs or banks because there's no
interest right now and we see the
opposite happening and this is what
happens at the back end of the system
when it's dying because when we come off
the goaltend they were coming off a
standard which was checks and balances
with gold now throughout this whole
period of time they've been creating
currency creating debt creating currency
creating debt and there are no more
checks and balances so everything's
starting to break apart their system is
designed to break apart at a certain
point it never lasts and we're starting
to see PCE inflation tick up on a
year-to-year basis it is moving up right
now and it's rising at the fastest rate
since March 2012 now the Fed has gone
out and they have done stress tests on
all different banks and some banks
didn't do that well now we know the
stress tests they're a bunch of BS and
the only reason they created this test
was because back in 2008 people were
losing confidence in banks because they
needed bailouts and they needed to
restore confidence so they said you know
something will create something called a
stress test to let you know how the
banks are doing
and we know this is fake phony and false
but they pointed to the really bad banks
where they're in big trouble like
Deutsche Bank and many other banks well
they were they didn't do too well and we
can see that a lot of these banks
they're buying back their stocks paying
out dividends and when we look at this
the biz has been telling us that some of
these banks have been manipulating their
books what they're showing and what's
really happening is not the same and
this is what happened to leave it now we
didn't know any of this until Lehman
imploded and then we saw you know other
banking or other insurance companies or
manufacturers then they all started
coming out of the woodwork saying they
had too much debt they couldn't make
payment they couldn't do anything and
when then we saw AIG as for a bailout
the automobile industry asked for a
bailout we saw Bear Stearns and many
many other banks Bank of America
Goldman Sachs JP Morgan Chase they all
asked for something and we see once
again that we don't know what's really
happening just that the biz is telling
us this it means that it's much bigger
than what they're saying now what's very
interesting we talk about minutiae and
how he's always out there and in the
beginning he said that Trump was gonna
look at the TPP he might even sign the
TPP and the u.s. might join you know
with the other countries well Trump came
out and said no we're not doing that so
that turned out to be fake phony and
false then manoosh in came out and he
started to talk about all different
other things where he's tweeting for
Donald Trump and once again that turned
out to be fake now Trump is out there
and is reported by Axios saying that the
Trump administration is looking to leave
the World Trade Organization now we know
that Trump doesn't like the WTO he's
making a lot of bilateral trades minutia
on the other hand is out there saying
that this is a fake story now this is
very interesting because minutiae and
Trump they're not on the same page
actually manoosh in I think is trying to
convince Trump for the central bank and
the bankers to move him in a certain
direction and I think Trump fights back
and I think trumman ushion right now is
trying to stop what is really happening
here and I think what's really happening
is eventually just like the TPP NAFTA I
think Trump is gonna want to leave the
WTO I don't think he thinks it's a
benefit I think he thinks there's no
reason for this and I think that there's
no reason to have a centralized trading
organization and of course this is set
up by the central bank the globalist to
control all the countries bring them
down to a certain level so they're all
even and we see right now it's better to
be diversified in having bilateral
trades with each country making a deal
with each country so if this deal fills
apart with let's say France
it doesn't affect anyone else and I
think right now minuchin is either being
set up and Trump is watching him and
maybe he's going to get rid of him
because he did this with McMasters he
did this with many many other people so
we see right now that the central
bankers the globalists they are very
worried because their system is being
dismantled right in front of their eyes
because what is happening all of this is
being done to prepare for this major
transition and this transition is going
to happen one way or another because the
only way out of this is to destroy the
globalist central banking system and
once that is done then you're free to
move this system in any direction you
want and of course the central bankers
they're not going to want this to happen
they're going to want their system to be
moved to their new system so this is
where we go back to the idea of who's
going to control the narrative just like
in the 70s who controlled the narrative
back then it was the globalist the
central bank where they said there's
gold speculators and we need to take the
dollar off gold the gold standard and
they made this whole story up
to make us believe that this is why this
is happening this is why we're seeing
shortages in fuel and this is why we
have inflation this is why we see high
interest rates and they made up this
whole entire story the back story was
they didn't tell us that we were moving
off the gold standard onto their new
system the petrodollar system where they
can create currency without any checks
and balances so once again whoever
controls the narrative is going to
control the next move and we can see
Trump in the Patriots and the central
bank and the globalists they are
fighting it out right now listen
everyone thanks a lot for listening be
well be safe and especially be prepared
thanks a lot
